algorithm_technique: Binary search on the partition point of the smaller array to find the k-th element.
Binary search on the value range to find the k-th element across multiple sorted arrays.
problem_summary_simple: Find the median of two sorted arrays combined.
problem_summary_technical: Find the k-th smallest element in the union of two sorted arrays using binary search on partitions or values.
key_insights: The core idea is to find the k-th smallest element efficiently.
The first solution uses binary search on the partition of the smaller array to achieve O(log(min(m, n))).
The second solution is a more general approach that can handle multiple arrays by binary searching on the value range.
